title: Anti-Abortion Laws Sweep the U.S. & Bill de Blasio Enters the Presidential Race | Kirsten Gillibrand
itunes:title: Anti-Abortion Laws Sweep the U.S. & Bill de Blasio Enters the Presidential Race | Kirsten Gillibrand
description:
State Republicans pass extreme anti-abortion laws, Bill de Blasio joins the Democratic presidential field, and Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand discusses her 2020 White House bid.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
